extendedInfo.description: EVAN absolutely blows away Google Now, Siri and every other assistant when it comes to useful features. If you haven't tried it yet what are you waiting for? TRY IT NOW!It's the only assistant that has a dedicated car mode and literally over a hundred more features than the rest. Browse through the command list and you will see that it's no lie that EVA is the leader when it comes to useful features: http://www.eva4android.com/quickstartThis is a free 28 day trial version that has all the same features as the paid version.EVAN is a must have app if you want to use voice to increase your productivity. It's like Siri but with so many truly useful functions you will wonder why it doesn't come standard with Android. It includes a dedicated Car Mode that is extremely useful if you want to use your phone while driving. It is the one application that makes your smart phone so much smarter. It includes a powerful Profiles feature that allows you to change loads of settings on your phone in one instant simply by changing the Profile. There are over 30 videos on YouTube (link below) that walk you though every aspect of the application. Take advantage of the free 28 day trial as you cannot possibly try it in a few hours let alone a week. Read the reviews to see what other people are saying and if you like it please tell your family, friends and co-workers.Who should use EVAN? If you are looking for an application that provides hands-free operation of your phone then EVAN is right for you. If you are just looking for an electronic friend to chat with then please go with one of the Siri clones. On the other hand if you want a real virtual assistant that has extremely useful functions that will make your life easier then please give EVAN a try.EVAN has all the functions you'd expect your assistant to perform plus some that you probably never knew were possible. Here is a list of some of the functions that you wont find in most of the competition:â Voice messaging, emails, memos and journals using your own voiceâ Reading and replying to incoming text (including Google Voice) and email (including Microsoft Exchange)â Reading and replying to incoming instant messages via Google Talkâ Integration with Google+â Integration with Evernoteâ Integration with Taskerâ Home Automation with INSTEON. Turn on the lights and appliances, open the garage door and a whole lot more, all with voice commands or scheduled or based on your location.â Time based reminders. Remind you to do something on a day and/or time.â Location based reminders. Remind you to do something based on your location.â Location based actions. Perform any function that EVAN can do based on your current location. Have EVAN automatically text your wife when you leave the office.â Time based actions. Perform any function that EVAN can do on a set day and timeâ In-Car mode including wake up phrase and fully customizable function buttonsâ Custom voice shortcuts to your phone applications. Give your apps any name you want and open them using that name.â Voice bookmarks to your favorite web sites. â Activate just by shaking your phoneâ Works with all Bluetooth Headsets and most In-Car Bluetooth devicesâ Read and write NFC tags on compatible devicesâ Remote control your phone over Google Talkâ Too many other features to listFor the full online manual please go to:http://www.eva4android.com/evanIf you prefer a female assistant please choose EVA instead. If you don't already have a third party text to speech voice that replaces the default Pico voice on your phone I recommend SVOX Classic.Download the Free SVOX Classic to demo the voices. EVAN is English only. Please don't give 1 star ratings for not having your language.

reviews.comment: Great app.
reviews.author: Beatriz Secreto

reviews.title: Useful but still issues..
reviews.comment: Evan is almost the perfect man! It takes a little work training him.There are still bugs, Evan doesn\'t always respond. Or he will interrupt what you are doing. The developer is very helpful if you have issues... When the bugs are fixed I\'ll give him a 5!  Peter, one example is that I was asking Evan to make a call & suddenly he started reciting my reminders. And sometimes it seems he isn\'t fully loaded & doesn\'t respond quickly. And sometimes even tho I have a wake phrase, I have to hit speak..
reviews.author: Dena T.

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: It will never be better than Iphone\'s Sirri! it is completely useless!
reviews.author: kyle meadon

reviews.comment: Totally horrible
reviews.author: Rob Taylor

reviews.title: unistalling
reviews.comment: fix the pop up when i exit out of evan there a pop up action to choose either evan or TWLauncher pop up is annoying.
reviews.author: Glen Burns

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Quirky. Makes me angry sometimes. I have hugh expectations for $20.00. I think the price is unfair. I have a crystal clear voice and it often does not respond correctly or even at all. When I first downloaded it it worked fine. Then two to three hours later it started misbehaving. I didn\'t do anything. I\'m not going to buy it until you fix these bugs. I just now had to completely uninstall it before it would even allow me access to my phone.
reviews.author: Blayne Douglas

reviews.title: Good app, but still a few more bugs
reviews.comment: I just got the most recent update, and I haven\'t tried the latest features yet because I\'m still trying to nail down the ones that are most important to me. For instance, I want to use Evan with my wireless Motorola headset, but he still has a few issues with hearing my responses. If I use the phone, I have to speak directly into the microphone--I can\'t be more than half an inch away, and this is in a quiet room. There are times where I\'ll use my wake up phrase, and Evan won\'t respond at all. Or I\'ll want to respond to an email, I\'ll see my response (\"Yes\") register, and then... he stops listening. Don\'t get me wrong, this app has AMAZING potential. Once this stuff gets fixed, I will be only too happy to buy it. But right now, it\'s defeating the purpose of having a hands free device.
reviews.author: Shavon Walker

reviews.title: VERY good but buggy
reviews.comment: Overall, everything works out fine, but the Wake mode with wired headset is so buggy, that I have to manually press \'speak\'  to make it response, even then it\'s still buggy, won\'t registered whatever I said. Occasionally will register my wired headset on motorcycle, but occasionally won\'t register my wired headset in quiet environment...  Please respond with what I should do, to make it more responsive on wired headset and on screen lock...
reviews.author: Chung Lin Lee

reviews.title: DONT DO IT!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This effing app screwed my whole phone up and I can\'t uninstall it!!!!!!! So creepy!!!!!!!!! Don\'t do it!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Sara Long

reviews.title: Amazing app, a bit buggy
reviews.comment: Bad points: Interferes with screenlock on Galaxy s4 tablet/Motorola Triumph phone.  On phone, disrupts bluetooth connection when I\'m listening to music and loads slowly.  Good points: Unbelievable scope of functionality, ability to integrate with other apps for more fun.  Wonderfully polite, can be taught new words.  Can change the voice.  Works brilliantly with good internet.  Reminds me of JARVIS uncannily. Best I\'ve tried.  Notes: Voice recognition improves over time.  Could use Spotify integration.
reviews.author: Vashti Hanline

reviews.title: Sucks!!!!
reviews.comment: Stupid app sucks!!!!!  Just a waste of money
reviews.author: Austin Smith

reviews.title: Ok for a trial
reviews.comment: Good features, but not worth the $ as there\'s no \"kill switch\".  Had to manually kill it as I didn\'t need/want it on 24/7 draining my battery dry.
reviews.author: Quyten Yalin

reviews.title: Most Powerful Assistant App But It\'s Not 100% Dependable
reviews.comment: To be honest, I really love the concept of this app. The dev is really good and supportive. This does way more stuff that most other apps. And if you want more features the dev will work with you. The problem is that it is not dependable. It didn\'t always do what it is supposed to do at the right time. For example one of the new features is to read new emails to you. At the time I download this app it was the only one one the market that was able to do that. But it is to buggy. It only works half the time.
reviews.author: Pastor Joseph Carty

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Make sure it\'s what you need & want awesome trial plan. Then be diligent like any assistant you hire going take a bit become familiar with each other!!! Once you are thru that phase you love your new assistant be lost with out him or her.
reviews.author: C. Mark Aubrey

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Kept interfering with what I.was doing Unusable
reviews.author: Connor Wright

reviews.title: Eric
reviews.comment: Some glitches but ideally impressive.
reviews.author: Eric S

reviews.title: Evan
reviews.comment: Good job Peter! Everyone needs to listen to your tutorial if they need an app like this. It tells you everything! It is long, but will help you set it up to really be your personal assistant. It\'s not Siri, but who needs her? LOL!
reviews.author: Marjory Ackerman

reviews.title: Evan
reviews.comment: Absolutely fabulous
reviews.author: Mary Chapman Knight

reviews.comment: I like Evan
reviews.author: Darya Morreale

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It is very useful
reviews.author: C Tank
